pitch.cc: That was pitch number 45 for Jered Weaver; his effectiveness may start slipping, as he holds opposing hitters to a .178 average in the first 45 pitches but they hit .227 off him after that.
Jered Weaver battled back from 3-0 to retire Nelson Cruz.

pitch.cc: Jered Weaver has thrown 94 pitches but has plenty left in the tank, with his fastball sitting at 92 over the past 10 pitches.
Dangerous count for Jered Weaver; Josh Hamilton is a dead-red fastball hitter, with a 1.179 OPS against them this season and 1.031 against everything else.
